item.title: Austin Butler on Being Mischaracterized as a Method Actor: “I Can Become Incredibly Obsessive”
item.description: “I think that word gets thrown around a lot. It’s a very misunderstood thing that isn’t really what I do,” the Oscar-nominated ‘Caught Stealing’ actor tells The Hollywood Reporter.

item.title: Rise of the Machines: Inside Hollywood’s AI Civil War
item.description: The technology is already transforming the industry — and could forever change the entertainment we consume. But the battle to contain it has just begun.
